concept.title: Notifying Users About the Upgrade
concept.shortdesc: As part of your upgrade to SiteCatalyst 15, it is critical that you effectively communicate the impact of the upgrade to your SiteCatalyst users.

conbody.p: Adobe recommends using both email notifications and SiteCatalyst home page announcements to educate users.
Your Adobe Account Manager is available to help you organize and prepare upgrade materials and training specific to your organizationâ€™s needs. Contact your Account Manager for more information.
